casebody.data:
State
v.
Sandra Meshell Brice 244P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 28, 2016

Daniel Lawrence Spiegel, Assistant Appellate Defender, For Brice, Sandra Meshell.

Staples Hughes, Durham.

Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Nancy D. Hardison, Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney Generals, David Learner, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of June 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of June 2016."
